General.Name: Triangle Tyre Co Ltd
General.Description: Triangle Tyre Co.,Ltd engages in the research and development, design, manufacture, and marketing of tire products in China. The company's products include passenger tires, truck and bus tires, off-the-road tires, commercial vehicle tires, and radial tires, as well as specialty tires. It provides its products through branches, as well as dealers and online in North America, the Americas, Europe, Russia, Australia, the Middle East, Africa, and Southeast Asia. The company was founded in 1976 and is based in Weihai, China. Triangle Tyre Co.,Ltd is a subsidiary of Triangle Group Co., Ltd.
General.Address: No. 56 Qingdao Middle Road, Weihai, China, 264200
